#summary How to enable debug mode for Safari 4 Windows

= Details =
Safari 4 on Windows


1) 
{{{
<key>WebKitDeveloperExtras</key>
<true/>
<key>IncludeDebugMenu</key>
<integer>1</integer>
}}}
2) Put the modified text to end of the %ProgramFiles%\Safari\Safari.resources\Defaults.plist right before the </dict> closing tag.
